Topic: Draw a string telephone between two students.
Evidence Statements: The student can draw a string telephone connecting two students to demonstrate communication over a distance.
The student can show the use of sound in the design, indicating how it travels through the string.
The student can include arrows or lines to represent how information (sound) travels between the two endpoints.
The student can use objects or tools to represent the materials used in creating the string telephone.
The student can illustrate the purpose of the telephone, showing it as a solution to the problem of communicating over long distances.
The student can label or highlight key features of the design, such as the cups and string, and how these parts function to transmit sound.
